remarks: Lines are sets of points (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 17-Oct-2019.)
statement:
tglng.p $e |- P = ( Base ` G ) $.
tglng.l $e |- L = ( LineG ` G ) $.
tglng.i $e |- I = ( Itv ` G ) $.
tglnpt.g $e |- ( ph -> G e. TarskiG ) $.
tglnpt.a $e |- ( ph -> A e. ran L ) $.
tglnpt.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. A ) $.
tglnpt $p |- ( ph -> X e. P ) $.
